meanings.definition: A type of plant belonging to the genus Medicago.
meanings.sent1: The medicks in the garden have small yellow flowers.
meanings.sent2: Farmers plant medicks to improve the soil quality.
meanings.sent3: The medicks whispered secrets to the neighboring flowers.
meanings.sent4: The medicks stood tall like guardians in the field.
meanings.sent5: Children loved playing hide-and-seek among the medicks.

meanings.definition: Plural form of medick, referring to a type of plant in the pea family.
meanings.sent1: I collected some medicks to study their leaves.
meanings.sent2: The medicks swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The medicks threw a party for the other plants.
meanings.sent4: The medicks danced together in harmony.
meanings.sent5: The medicks provided shade for the smaller plants around them.
